about_the_game:
Unlock unlimited button presses for using virtual button box with any application.

Use virtual buttons to trigger keystrokes on your PC via attached touch screens.
This can be a single key combination with up to three modifier keys or a recorded macro with any number of keystrokes.

Note that owning a full data DLC will already give you unlimited button presses for games supported by that DLC. This product is for use with any desktop application that has focus.

This full data unlock is for Steam only. Purchase to use DashPanel on Windows with touch screens attached to the local computer.
If you wish to use DashPanel with mobile devices purchase from the respective mobile store.
Steam purchases are not transferrable to any other store.
